overview:
Todd Nagle is a 25 year hotel food and beverage veteran that left the beloved biz and global posts to change how the wine trade does business.

He now heads up vinoetic: a web-based, B2B, marketing platform created specifically for wine pros. Climbing up through the ranks of hotel, food and beverage operations, Todd left his employer’s flagship property as division head to break new ground and write a new career and life chapter.

He teamed up with two tech guys to provide absent and much needed resources to wine trade professionals. His vision is to connect the trade, leverage technology to enhance the wine trade sales model and provide a means for wineries to market more effectively to their customers.
